description: This source file defines the SplashActivity class, which manages the app's startup splash screen. It determines whether the user has an active session based on stored email data and routes the user either to the LoginActivity or MainActivity accordingly.

classes.name: SplashActivity
classes.description: An activity that serves as the splash screen and initial route handler based on user session status.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the layout, creates a SessionStore instance, and launches a coroutine to determine and navigate to the next activity based on session email.
